title: How to Make Garlicky Fried Eggplants With Mayonnaise

steps.headline: Pour 2 Tbsp oil in hot frying pan.
Put the eggplant slices side by side in the oil.
steps.description: Make sure the oil is hot enough.

steps.headline: Turn the eggplant slices over quickly before they burn.
steps.description: At this point the cooking oil is very hot.

steps.headline: Turn the fire down and wait till the other side of the eggplant is also cooked (don't add extra oil)
Pull them out and lay on a flat plate.
steps.description: Don't pile them on top of each other.

steps.headline: Rub them with crushed garlic and sprinkle salt and black pepper.
Add one spoon of oil this time and repeat the procedure again.
Polish the eggplant with mayonnaise on top.

text: Peel the eggplants.  Cut them into thin slices.  Pour 2 Tbsp oil in hot frying pan.  Put the eggplant slices side by side in the oil. Make sure the oil is hot enough. Turn the eggplant slices over quickly before they burn. At this point the cooking oil is very hot. Turn the fire down and wait till the other side of the eggplant is also cooked (don't add extra oil)  Pull them out and lay on a flat plate. Don't pile them on top of each other. Rub them with crushed garlic and sprinkle salt and black pepper.  Add one spoon of oil this time and repeat the procedure again.  Polish the eggplant with mayonnaise on top.  Serve hot or cold.
